properties.Name: StatementOfAccumulatedComprehensiveIncomeAndHedgingActivities
properties.Description:
The Statement of Accumulated Comprehensive Income and Hedging Activities is used to itemize the accumulated other comprehensive income items on a net of tax basis as well as any other cash flow hedges the organization may have had.

This entity contains summary information. More detailed Row/Column information from the statement can be found in FINANCIAL STATEMENT VALUE.

Columns.Name: LegalEntityId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Legal Entity.

Columns.Name: FinancialStatementId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Financial Statement.

Columns.Name: PeriodStartDate
Columns.Description: The period start date for which the financial statement is prepared.

Columns.Name: PeriodEndDate
Columns.Description: The period end date for which the financial statement is prepared.

Columns.Name: BeginningBalancePriorPeriod
Columns.Description: The balance at the beginning of the accounting period.

Columns.Name: ReclassificationToNetIncomePriorPeriod
Columns.Description: The amount that was reclassified as net income during the accounting period.

Columns.Name: ChangesInFairValuePriorPeriod
Columns.Description: The amount of changes in fair value during the accounting period.

Columns.Name: EndingBalancePriorPeriod
Columns.Description: The balance at the end of the accounting period.

Columns.Name: BeginningBalanceCurrentPeriod
Columns.Description: The balance at the beginning of the accounting period.

Columns.Name: ReclassificationToNetIncomeCurrentPeriod
Columns.Description: The amount that was reclassified as net income during the accounting period.

Columns.Name: ChangesInFairValueCurrentPeriod
Columns.Description: The amount of changes in fair value during the accounting period.

Columns.Name: EndingBalanceCurrentPeriod
Columns.Description: The balance at the end of the accounting period.

Properties.Description:
The Statement of Accumulated Comprehensive Income and Hedging Activities is used to itemize the accumulated other comprehensive income items on a net of tax basis as well as any other cash flow hedges the organization may have had.

This entity contains summary information. More detailed Row/Column information from the statement can be found in FINANCIAL STATEMENT VALUE.
